document_data.name: the Green Gauntlet
document_data.mainbody: The '''Green Gauntlet''' was an [[inn]] found in [[Selgaunt]].
document_data.Location: The Green Gauntlet was found in the eastern section of the city along the docks and [[Selgaunt Bay]].
document_data.Activities: The inn was one of only two places within the city that tolerated [[adventurer]]s.
